value.name: Trooper Joseph Cameron Ponder: 5 Fast Facts You Need to Know
value.description: The suspect in the shooting, Joseph Thomas Johnson-Shanks, 25, of Missouri, was was shot and killed by police Monday morning. Trooper Joseph Ponder tried to conduct a traffic stop at about 10:20 ...

value.name: LIVE: Kentucky manhunt update
value.description: Kentucky State Police Trooper Joseph Cameron Ponder ... Investigators identified the suspect as Joseph Thomas Johnson-Shanks, 25, of Missouri.Sept. 14, 2015
